data_table.description: Ankle Brachial Blood Pressure (Ultrasound Workstation), Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: BPUAFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [1= presence] [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUACY
variable.description: Contact year [7] [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA01
variable.description: Ankle time [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA04
variable.description: First arm time [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA07
variable.description: Second arm time [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA10
variable.description: Third arm time [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA13
variable.description: Sitting time [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA16
variable.description: First standing time [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA19
variable.description: Second standing time [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA02
variable.description: Ankle systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA03
variable.description: Ankle diastolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA05
variable.description: First arm systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA06
variable.description: First arm diastolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA08
variable.description: Second arm systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA09
variable.description: Second arm diastolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA11
variable.description: Third arm systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA12
variable.description: Third arm diastolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA14
variable.description: Sitting systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA15
variable.description: Sitting diastolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA17
variable.description: First standing systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.description: First standing diastolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.description: Second standing systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: BPUA21
variable.description: Second standing diastolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 3]
